Repeat: insert right-hand needle from below under the 3 loose strands on right side of work; yarn over needle and draw up a loop (gathering loop); purl the next stitch and slip the gathering loop over purled stitch; p9
End Row: insert right-hand needle from below under the 3 loose strands on right side of work; yarn over needle and draw up a loop (gathering loop); purl the next stitch and slip the gathering loop over purled stitch; p8

Repeat: lift 3 loose strands with gathering loop, purl the next stitch and slip loop over purled stitch; p9
End Row: lift 3 loose strands with gathering loop, purl the next stitch and slip loop over purled stitch; p3
